title: Entrepreneurial Leadership Development Program Based on Economics of Care

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Economics Concepts and General Interest in Entrepreneurship
context.additional_context: Course for medical, legal, and technical professionals to learn methods of creating social value by combining caring economy and entrepreneurial capabilities

learning_goals: Learners apply core principles of caring economics (mutual growth, community spirit) to entrepreneurial processes.
Learners design business models that simultaneously consider social responsibility and profitability via VR simulation.
Learners develop an evaluation system to measure the social impact and sustainability of entrepreneurial ideas through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
